content.prompt: In the second paragraph (lines 13-20), the author primarily

choices.label: lists the challenges others have experienced in cataloging Lincoln’s jokes
describes how Lincoln’s skill in telling jokes improved over the years
distinguishes between the content and the delivery of Lincoln’s jokes
details the difficulty in verifying when Lincoln’s jokes were recounted

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Describe the line of reasoning and explain whether it supports an argument's overarching thesis.
